body.name: Geniospin Queen Comforter Set, Bed in a Bag 7-Pieces, with Comforter, Pillow Sham, Flat Sheet, Fitted Sheet and Pillowcase, All Season Comfortable Seersucker Bedding Soft & Cozy (Dark Green, 90"x90")
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 26 mins
features: Soft and Comfy : This queen comforter set features a year-round microfiber fabric construction for comfortable use. The hypoallergenic filling in the comforter, being made of ultra fine fibers. It is soft and lightweight, the cloud-like soft bedding set keeps you cozy and warm sleep through every night for all seasons.

Unique Style: Unique Chic Seersucker comforter. Designed in classic dark Green, Featuring simple yet elegant 3D Botanical Leaf design, coming with matching shams, sheets. Vibrant garden style which perfectly blends fashion and abstract art,add an extra layer of art style to match your room décor and brighten your rooms.

Components & Size: Complete bed in a bag with great deal! Our queen size comforter set includes 7 piece(inch): 1 Seersucker comforter 90x90, 1 flat sheet 90x102+4, 1 fitted sheet 60x80+14, 2 shams 20x26, 2 pillow cases 20x30+4. Fitted sheet with 14" deep pocket design ensures a snug fit on your mattress .

Delicate workmanship: This queen comforter is crafted by fine workmanship. Whole-piece microfiber fill in the comforter provides exceptional warmth and cozy. Firm quilting, no shifting after washing, soft and breathable. Since the comforter is packaged in a vacuum bag, it is highly recommended to expose it in the sun and tap gently for fluffy.

Care & Services: Machine wash cold separately, gentle cycle, tumble dry low, do not bleach or iron. We provide bedding comforter sets free return and exchange service, don't hesitate to contact us if you have any questions, please rest assured to buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxury for a steal!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This set is amazing! The colors are vibrant. The set is soft. The sheets have deep pockets. The comforter is so cozy. I have washed the comforter 3 times now and it is holding very well. No shrinking or fading of colors. The sheets have been washed many times, and have no snags, fading or shrinking. The side pockets of the sheets can hold a book, phone or tablet. Very convenient for people who are always doing something.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and very beautiful
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a beautiful set of bed linen. I didn’t regret the purchase at all, the fabric is incredibly adaptable to the body, the stitching is just perfect, all the seams are even, the threads don’t stick out, the color is as in the photo. I’ve already washed it and it hasn’t faded at all. Overall, I’m delighted! And the packaging is very beautiful. My parents bought a new apartment and are in need of renovations, so I think I’ll give them the same set as a housewarming gift. And I will definitely order myself another one in a different color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy quilt, Excellent value
reviews.reviewText: This came in a giftable cardboard box. This is a heavy quilt. It has a velvet type fabric backing that is soft, but makes this heavier than your usual quilt of this type. This is a soft fabric with nice stitching. It washed easily, but took a little bit to dry. It hangs over my king bed about 8" on each side. This is a super good value at $25.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this comforter! Been looking for something light, not heavy, and warm, but not too warm. This is it! I also wanted something that I was able to wash in my washer and dry in my dryer, in other words low maintenance! I washed as directions it came with. Cold water, and low heat to dry, well I dryer in low medium. Took awhile to dry, but well worth it! It is so soft and fluffy! Also , warm but not hot!! Ity so comfortable! I love getting in bed at night! Especially now that it is so chilly at night now. The color was a little darker than I wanted, but as much as I love it I can live with it. Oh, I have a queen size bed with a thick mattress and it fits perfectly on my bed. Really good buy, great quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: While the comforter is a bit thinner than I had hoped, it is very pretty. I got the light blue full size. It doesn't hang down over the sides as much as I would like, but most do not these days. It was very wrinkled when it came out of the package, but I gave it a sprinkle of water and tumbled on low in my dryer, and that took care of most of the wrinkles. Nice set for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: I love this comforter set. It’s so soft and comfy. It wasn’t expensive and the linen color looks beautiful and easy to match with other decor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Soft and Cozy!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: AMAZING PRODUCT!!!Why is this not the first item on the bedding sets list????I bought this set 4 months ago and had to go back to write an honest review. I purchased the cream colored Bedding set with sheets included for my guestroom.I have purchased a LOT of expensive bedding in my day and let me tell you this is way better in terms of softness and comfort. I perfer this to my own $400 Clavin Klein bedding set i purchased 8 years ago!!It is so simple yet luxurious feeling, that you can't believe its not a designer brand. Everytime a guest stays over or I take a nap a very nice compliment is made on the bedding.I am also very pleasently surprised that it holds up in the winter, so it really holds in heat withour feeling heavy.Upon close inspection, the stitching is not perfect, so maybe thats why it has such a low pricepoint? Who cares, it's still a gem of a find!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is way nicer than I thought it was going to be. The pattern and color are beautiful. The material is breathable but this isn’t a lightweight comforter …..And it came with sheets that are so soft, and have the cutest little phone/remote pocket on the side. I’m impressed! And will buy this brand again.
